title: Pursuing Penelope
description: They gave her the love and tender dominance that will set her free.Pulled from the raging inferno of Incognito, the recently widowed Penelope Schwartz has hit rock bottom and is the prime suspect in the arson. Worse, her past has come back to haunt her. When the firefighters who rescued her show up at her house, all she can do is cling to them and revel in their tender care.Joseph and Blake believe in her innocence and offer a gentle dominance that nurtures her lonely heart. But can this inexperienced, natural submissive gain their love forever, or are they like the other men in her past whoâ€™ve wanted to own her?
author: Madison Layle
